radiographic_examinations.findings: Late gadolinium enhancement (LGE) changes in both left and right ventricle; signs of acute ongoing inflammation.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Reduction in left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF – 46%) with diastolic dysfunction noted.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Reduced ejection fraction of the left ventricle (LVEF – 46%) with diastolic dysfunction.
